column1: The Appellant states that the Respondent was present at the hearing held on 1st March
2016, and that the Tribunal was informed that the parties have agreed to the terms of
settlement. The hearing had accordingly been postponed to 9th March 2016 to enter the
terms of settlement. Thus, the Respondent was aware that the Tribunal was to meet
again on 9th March 2016. However, when the matter was taken up on 9th March 2016,
the Respondent was not present and the Tribunal had made the following order:
